import { AuthService } from 'src/app/auth-service/auth.service';
import { ExportService } from './../services/export.service';
import { Component, OnInit, ViewChild, HostListener } from '@angular/core';
import { Report } from '../models/Report';
import { MatTableFilter } from 'mat-table-filter';
import { MatPaginator, MatTableDataSource, MatTabChangeEvent } from '@angular/material';
import { ReportService } from '../services/report.service';
import { SelectionModel } from '@angular/cdk/collections';
import { PeriodicElement } from '../task-melden/task-melden.component';
import * as XLSX from 'xlsx';
@Component({
  selector: 'app-mijn-meldingen',
  templateUrl: './mijn-meldingen.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./mijn-meldingen.component.css']
})
export class MijnMeldingenComponent implements OnInit {
  constructor( private reportService: ReportService,private exportService: ExportService, public authService: AuthService) { }
  displayedColumns: string[] = [
    'title',
    'category',
    'campus',
    'location',
    'status',
    'priority',
    'upVote',
    'detail'
  ];
  columnsToSort = [
    {value: 'title', viewValue: 'title'},
    {value: 'category', viewValue: 'category'},
    {value: 'campus', viewValue: 'campus'},
    {value: 'location', viewValue: 'location'},
    {value: 'status', viewValue: 'status'},
    {value: 'upVote', viewValue: 'upVote'}
   ]
  dataSource = new MatTableDataSource<any>([]);
  dataSource2 = new MatTableDataSource<any>([]);
  dataSource3 = new MatTableDataSource<any>([]);
  newInnerHeight;
  newInnerWidth ;
  reports: any;
  filteredArray = [];
  searchText;
  filterEntity: Report;
  filterType: MatTableFilter;
  @ViewChild(MatPaginator, {static: false}) paginator: MatPaginator;
  @ViewChild('paginator2', { static: false }) paginator2: MatPaginator;
  @ViewChild('paginator3', { static: false }) paginator3: MatPaginator;
  @ViewChild('tabGroup', { static: true }) tabGroup;
  @ViewChild('tabGroup2', { static: true }) tabGroup2;
  retrieveResonse: any;
  base64Data: any;
  retrievedImage: string;
  isReportLoaded:Boolean;
  isSubLoaded:Boolean;
  disableTextbox =  false;
  isMyDefectenLoaded: Boolean;
  reportsAssign = [];
  reportsSub = [];
  exportedArray: any = [];
  public direction = 'desc'; //asc desc
  public sortBy = "title"
  @HostListener('window:resize', ['$event'])
  onResize(event) {
    this.newInnerHeight = event.target.innerHeight;
    this.newInnerWidth = event.target.innerWidth;
    console.log(this.newInnerWidth);
  }
  applyFilter(event: Event) {
    const filterValue = (event.target as HTMLInputElement).value;
    this.dataSource.filter = filterValue.trim().toLowerCase();
    //this.repots.filter = filterValue.trim().toLowerCase();
  }


  ngOnInit() {
    this.newInnerWidth = window.innerWidth;

    this.getMyReports();
    this.filterEntity = new Report();
    this.filterType = MatTableFilter.ANYWHERE;


    let index = localStorage.getItem('userTabLocation') || 0; // get stored number or zero if there is nothing stored
    let indexNr = +index;
    this.tabGroup.selectedIndex = indexNr; // with tabGroup being the MatTabGroup accessed through ViewChild
    this.tabGroup2.selectedIndex = indexNr;

    this.getAssignToMeReports();
    this.getSubscribedReports();
  }



  ngOnDestroy () {
    let index = localStorage.removeItem('userTabLocation');

}

    /**
   * deze functie check eerst wat is de prioriteit en dan maakt Background Color
   * @param priority check if priority HIGH OF MEDIUM OF LOW
   */
  setPriorityColor(priority): String
  {
    switch (priority) {
        case 'HIGH':
          return '#af0412'; // Red
        case 'NORMAL':
          return '#ffa500'; // Orange
        case 'LOW':
          return '#28a745'; // Green
    }
  }

  getMyReports(){
    const userId = localStorage.getItem("UserID")
    this.reportService.getMyReports(userId).subscribe(res => {

      if(res !== null && res.length > 0) {
        this.dataSource = new MatTableDataSource<Report>(res);
        this.dataSource.paginator = this.paginator;
        this.reports = res;
        this.isReportLoaded = true;
      } else {
        this.isReportLoaded = false;
      }

  })
}
handleMatTabChange(event: MatTabChangeEvent ) {
  localStorage.setItem('userTabLocation', event.index.toString());
  console.log(event.index);
}


toggleDisable() {
  this.disableTextbox = !this.disableTextbox;
}


  /**
   * get alle taken die aan een bapaalde gebruiker toegewijzen worden
   */
  getAssignToMeReports() {
    this.reportService.getAssignToMeReports().subscribe((res) => {

      if(res !== null && res.length > 0) {
        this.dataSource2 = new MatTableDataSource<Report>(res);
        this.dataSource2.paginator = this.paginator2;
        this.reportsAssign = res;
        this.isMyDefectenLoaded = true;
      } else {
        this.isMyDefectenLoaded = false;
      }

    });
  }

  getSubscribedReports(){
    this.reportService.getSubscribedReports().subscribe((res) => {
      if(res !== null && res.length > 0) {
        this.dataSource3 = new MatTableDataSource<Report>(res);
        this.dataSource3.paginator = this.paginator3;
        this.reportsSub = res;
        this.isSubLoaded = true;
      } else {
        this.isSubLoaded = false;
      }
    });
  }

    /**
   * deze function export data rows naar Excel bestand
   * export ook volgens search criteria
   */

  exportTable() {
    this.exportService.ExportData(this.dataSource2,"To Do", "Defecten To Do");

  }

  SortBy(){
    //asc desc
    switch(this.direction){
      case  'asc':
         return this.direction = 'desc';
      case 'desc':
        return this.direction = 'asc';
      default:
        return this.direction = 'desc';
    }

  }
}

<mat-tab-group [hidden]="newInnerWidth < 500" #tabGroup (selectedTabChange)="handleMatTabChange($event)">

    <!-- Mijn Defecten -->
    <mat-tab #Oversicht label="Mijn defecten">
        <div [hidden]="!isReportLoaded">
            <div *ngIf='newInnerWidth >  500' class="header mt-3 mb-3">
                <h2 class="headerText">Mijn defecten</h2>
                <br/>
            </div>

            <div #TABLE class="mat-elevation-z8 mb-3 container">
                <br/>
                <mat-table id="ExampleTable" #table matTableFilter [dataSource]="dataSource" [exampleEntity]="filterEntity" [filterType]="filterType">

                    <!-- Title Column -->
                    <ng-container matColumnDef="title">
                        <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>
                            <mat-form-field>
                                <input matInput placeholder="Title" [(ngModel)]="filterEntity.title">
                            </mat-form-field>
                        </mat-header-cell>
                        <mat-cell *matCellDef="let e">{{e.title}}</mat-cell>
                    </ng-container>

                    <!-- Category Column -->
                    <ng-container matColumnDef="category">
                        <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>
                            <mat-form-field>
                                <input matInput placeholder="Categorie" [(ngModel)]="filterEntity.category">
                            </mat-form-field>
                        </mat-header-cell>
                        <mat-cell *matCellDef="let e">{{e.category}}</mat-cell>
                    </ng-container>

                    <!-- Campus Column -->
                    <ng-container matColumnDef="campus">
                        <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>
                            <mat-form-field>
                                <input matInput placeholder="Campus" [(ngModel)]="filterEntity.campus">
                            </mat-form-field>
                        </mat-header-cell>
                        <mat-cell *matCellDef="let e">{{e.campus}}</mat-cell>
                    </ng-container>

                    <!-- Location Column -->
                    <ng-container matColumnDef="location">
                        <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>
                            <mat-form-field>
                                <input matInput placeholder="Location" [(ngModel)]="filterEntity.location">
                            </mat-form-field>
                        </mat-header-cell>
                        <mat-cell *matCellDef="let e">{{e.location}}</mat-cell>
                    </ng-container>

                    <!-- Status Column -->
                    <ng-container matColumnDef="status">
                        <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>
                            <mat-form-field>
                                <input matInput placeholder="Status" [(ngModel)]="filterEntity.status">
                            </mat-form-field>
                        </mat-header-cell>
                        <mat-cell *matCellDef="let e">{{(e.status.length > 10 ) ? (e.status | slice:0:14) + '..' : (e.status)}}</mat-cell>
                    </ng-container>


                    <!-- Priority Column -->
                    <ng-container matColumnDef="priority">
                        <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>
                            <mat-form-field>
                                <input matInput placeholder="Priority" readonly>
                            </mat-form-field>
                        </mat-header-cell>
                        <mat-cell *matCellDef="let e"><span class='dot-web' [ngStyle]="{'background-color': setPriorityColor(e.priority)}"></span></mat-cell>
                    </ng-container>

                    <!-- Upvote Column -->
                    <ng-container matColumnDef="upVote">
                        <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>
                            <mat-form-field>
                                <input matInput placeholder="UpVote" readonly>
                            </mat-form-field>
                        </mat-header-cell>
                        <mat-cell *matCellDef="let e">{{e.upVote}}</mat-cell>
                    </ng-container>

                    <!-- Details Column -->
                    <ng-container matColumnDef="detail">
                        <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>
                            <mat-form-field>
                                <input matInput placeholder="Details" readonly>
                            </mat-form-field>
                        </mat-header-cell>
                        <mat-cell *matCellDef="let e"><a [routerLink]="['/meldingen/detail', e.id]"><i class="fa fa-info-circle detailsIcon"></i></a></mat-cell>
                    </ng-container>

                    <mat-header-row *matHeaderRowDef="displayedColumns"></mat-header-row>
                    <mat-row *matRowDef="let row; columns: displayedColumns;"></mat-row>
                </mat-table>

                <mat-paginator #paginator [pageSizeOptions]="[5, 10, 20]" showFirstLastButtons></mat-paginator>
            </div>

        </div>


        <div [hidden]="isReportLoaded !== undefined" class="container">
            <div class="spinner-border text-danger" role="status">
                <span class="sr-only">Loading...</span>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div [hidden]="isReportLoaded || isReportLoaded === undefined">
            <div class="header-mobile container">
                <p> Er zijn geen resultaten </p>
                <img class="EmptyImageMobile" src="../../assets/images/empty.png" alt="image" />
            </div>
        </div>
    </mat-tab>

    <!-- Toegewijzn aan mij -->
    <mat-tab *ngIf="authService.isMedewerker" #Toegewijzen label="Toegewezen aan mij">
        <div [hidden]="!isMyDefectenLoaded">
            <div *ngIf='newInnerWidth >  500' class="header mt-3">
                <h2 class="headerText">Mijn job (To Do)</h2>
                <br/>
            </div>
            <div class="export" [hidden]='newInnerWidth <  500'>
                <i data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Export Data" class="fa fa-download exportIcon" (click)="exportTable()"></i>
            </div>
            <div class="mat-elevation-z8 mb-3 container">
                <br/>
                <mat-table #table matTableFilter [dataSource]="dataSource2" [exampleEntity]="filterEntity" [filterType]="filterType">

        <div [hidden]="!isSubLoaded">

                    <!-- Location Column -->
                    <ng-container matColumnDef="location">
                        <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>
                            <mat-form-field>
                                <input matInput placeholder="Location" [(ngModel)]="filterEntity.location">
                            </mat-form-field>
                        </mat-header-cell>
                        <mat-cell *matCellDef="let e">{{e.location}}</mat-cell>
                    </ng-container>

                    <!-- Status Column -->
                    <ng-container matColumnDef="status">
                        <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>
                            <mat-form-field>
                                <input matInput placeholder="Status" [(ngModel)]="filterEntity.status">
                            </mat-form-field>
                        </mat-header-cell>
                        <mat-cell *matCellDef="let e">{{(e.status.length > 10 ) ? (e.status | slice:0:14) + '..' : (e.status)}}</mat-cell>
                    </ng-container>

                    <!-- Priority Column -->
                    <ng-container matColumnDef="priority">
                        <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>
                            <mat-form-field>
                                <input matInput placeholder="Priority" [(ngModel)]="filterEntity.priority" readonly>
                            </mat-form-field>
                        </mat-header-cell>
                        <mat-cell *matCellDef="let e"><span class='dot-web' [ngStyle]="{'background-color': setPriorityColor(e.priority)}"></span></mat-cell>
                    </ng-container>

                    <!-- upVote Column -->
                    <ng-container matColumnDef="upVote">
                        <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>
                            <mat-form-field>
                                <input matInput placeholder="upVote" [(ngModel)]="filterEntity.upVote" readonly>
                            </mat-form-field>
                        </mat-header-cell>
                        <mat-cell *matCellDef="let e">{{e.upVote}}</mat-cell>
                    </ng-container>

                    <!-- Details Column -->
                    <ng-container matColumnDef="detail">
                        <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>
                            <mat-form-field>
                                <input matInput placeholder="Detail" readonly>
                            </mat-form-field>
                        </mat-header-cell>
                        <mat-cell *matCellDef="let e"><a [routerLink]="['/meldingen/detail', e.id]"><i class="fa fa-info-circle detailsIcon"></i></a></mat-cell>
                    </ng-container>

                    <mat-header-row *matHeaderRowDef="displayedColumns"></mat-header-row>
                    <mat-row *matRowDef="let row; columns: displayedColumns;"></mat-row>
                </mat-table>
                <mat-paginator #paginator3 [pageSizeOptions]="[5, 10, 20]" showFirstLastButtons></mat-paginator>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div [hidden]="isSubLoaded !== undefined" class="container">
            <div class="spinner-border text-danger" role="status">
                <span class="sr-only">Loading...</span>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div [hidden]="isSubLoaded || isSubLoaded === undefined">
            <div class="header-mobile container">
                <p> Er zijn geen resultaten </p>
                <img class="EmptyImageMobile" src="../../assets/images/empty.png" alt="image" />
            </div>
        </div>
    </mat-tab>


</mat-tab-group>

                <mat-label>
                    <mat-icon>search</mat-icon>
                </mat-label>

            </mat-form-field>

                            {{col.viewValue}}
                            <i class="fas fa-arrow-up sortPile" *ngIf="direction === 'asc'"></i>
                            <i class="fas fa-arrow-down sortPile" *ngIf="direction === 'desc'"></i>

                        </mat-option>
                    </mat-select>
                </mat-form-field>

                    </section>

.container {
    margin-top: 50px;
    text-align: center;
}

    width: 100%;
}

    font-size: 14px;
    width: 100%;
    color: #af0412;
}

    /*change color of label*/
    color: #af0412 !important;
}

::ng-deep.mat-form-field-underline {
    /*change color of underline*/
    background-color: #af0412 !important;
}

::ng-deep.mat-form-field-ripple {
    /*change color of underline when focused*/
    background-color: #af0412 !important;
    ;
}

    float: right;
    color: #af0412;
}
